forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 45. North wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 72. East wind 3 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the early hours of the morning stretch gently into dawn over Boston, the city is blanketed in a serene embrace of stillness, the air crisp and cool, reflecting the promise of a bright day ahead. Currently hovering around 45 degrees, a light breeze from the north meanders through the streets, evoking an unhurried sense of awakening. The night has played hide-and-seek with the clouds, yielding only a few, hinting at the clarity that the sun will soon bring.

As the sun rises above the horizon, Thursday is expected to unfold in a glorious display of blue skies and sun-kissed warmth, with temperatures climbing to a comfortable 72 degrees. The eastern breeze will play its part, lending a welcoming touch to the unfolding day. Such conditions encourage the unhurried moments of life: perhaps a leisurely stroll through the parks, or a quiet visit to a local café for a morning cup of coffee, where one can savor both the drink and the company of fellow dawn seekers. Dress in layers; a light jacket would serve you well in the cooler morning, giving way to something more casual as the sun warms the air. Engage in simple pleasures, watch the world come alive, or simply lose yourself in a book while perched on a bench, allowing the beauty of the day to wash over you.
